interface.name: vim-stratifiedjs
interface.description:
# Vim syntax support for [stratified javascript][sjs]
To use with [pathogen][], copy contents into `~/.vim/bundle`. If you don't use [pathogen][], now's a good time to start - but you can always install manually if you're stubborn.
[pathogen]: https://github.com/tpope/vim-pathogen [sjs]: http://onilabs.com/stratifiedjs

div.h1: Vim syntax support for stratified javascript
div.p: To use with pathogen, copy contents into ~/.vim/bundle. If you don't use pathogen, now's a good time to start - but you can always install manually if you're stubborn.
